requestParams.name: settings
requestParams.desc: 商品配送方式,json字符串,结构如：{"335438058":{"express":1,"local_delivery":0,"self_fetch":0}} 其中 express 为快递；local_delivery 为同城送；self_fetch 为到店自提。1为开启0为关闭。

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['offline_id']=50787601
params['settings']="{"440314986":{"express":1,"local_delivery":0,"self_fetch":0}}"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.multistore.goods.delivery.update', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'50787601', 'settings' => '{"440314986":{"express":1,"local_delivery":0,"self_fetch":0}}', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->get($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

name: update
scenarios: 更新网点商品配送方式
desc: 更新网点商品配送方式
